data.title: A Premier Christian College
data.meta_description: A premier Christian college, Regent is Christ-centered and purpose-driven. Accredited. Affordable. Top-ranked & transformative. Explore the difference.
data.text:
Christ Centered. Purpose Driven.

Nestled in beautiful Virginia Beach, Regent is ranked among top national universities. As a premier Christian college, we are Christ-centered and purpose-driven, equipping students like you to achieve your God-given potential. Here, you can experience support on all fronts – academic, personal, and spiritual.

Have specific career goals? At Regent, you can select from over 400 programs in 150+ fields of study, so you don’t have to “settle” for a degree that’s not aligned with your dream.

Want to a pursue bachelor’s in cyber security? Train at our multi-million-dollar cyber range and learn about our graduate who bagged an internship at Google, Switzerland. Prefer a degree in acting? Enter the spotlight with a BFA in Acting.

Follow your passion, with the freedom to select from a spectrum of programs. These include business, communication, cyber security and information technology, nursing and healthcare, education, psychology and counseling, ministry, government, and law. You can join a supportive network of mentors and students – people who will support you, pray with you, and cheer you along.

Lay the foundation of your future with an authentic Christian college experience. To learn more, call 800.373.5504 or fill out the Request Information form on this page.

LET’S TALK EXCELLENCE

The U.S. News & World Report ranked Regent among top national universities in 2019, 2020 and 2022. Students who began as visitors to the campus have commented on the difference they experienced during their first visit. A sense of peace accompanies you here.

We have been ranked by Niche among the Top 15 Best College Campuses in America, 2021, and have received an “A+” Campus Rating. Want to experience the difference? Schedule a personalized tour. You can also join a webinar to get more details online. If you thrive on personalized attention, Regent is the place for you. Our faculty are more than teachers – they are mentors. You can learn from experts whose experience is matched only by the accolades they have received.
